Please review the RIGIS license agreement at http://www.edc.uri.edu/rigis/license.html for more information before accessing these data.</accconst> <useconst>This dataset is provided for reference only.  These data were created for informational, planning and guidance use only. They are a general reference, not a legally authoritative source for the location of natural or manmade features. Proper interpretation of these data may requre the assistance of appropriate professional services. The cartographic representations depicted have not been verified by a RI Registered Professional Land Surveyor and are not intended to be used in place of a survey.
